body.name: PURA D'OR Therapy Shampoo (16oz) Hydrates & Nourishes - Scalp Care Shampoo For Itchy Flaky Scalp w/ Tea Tree, Peppermint, Patchouli, Cedarwood, Clary Sage, Argan Oil (Packaging may vary)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 59 mins
features: SCRATCH NO MORE: Scalp shampoo with a blend of Peppermint, Tea Tree and Lavender oils to soothe and calm dry, itchy scalp. This encourages clean, itch-free environment for stronger and healthier hair.
END THE DRYNESS NOW: Flakes, dandruff, and itching are caused by dry scalp. Our scalp care shampoo stops the flakes and itching caused by dryness by making sure your scalp gets the moisture it needs.
IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF YOUR HAIR: Replenish and nourish your hair with our dry scalp treatment. Our anti dandruff shampoo improves the texture of your hair by reducing frizz and static.
VISIBLE RESULTS IN AS EARLY AS 21 DAYS: Natural oils from our harsh free scalp treatment work together to promote overall hair and scalp health to provide visible results as early as 3 weeks.
body.description: Itch no more with PURA D’OR Scalp Therapy Shampoo. Made with all the essential ingredients that help fight flakes, dandruff, and scalp irritations. Our Scalp Therapy Shampoo is an anti-fungal scalp care infused with Clary Sage Oil and Argan Oil to keep your hair hydrated, naturally moisturized and clean which encourage healthy and well-nourished hair from roots to tips. Two-in-one anti-dandruff treatment and scalp shampoo contains Cedarwood Oil to calm irritated, itchy, dry scalp. Its mild formulation makes it safe for daily use and any hair types for men and women because it is paraben-free, sulfate-free, hypoallergenic, vegan and cruelty-free. Visible results as early as 3 weeks.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Scalp Therapy Shampoo About PURA D'OR PURA D’OR is driven by the desire to provide superior solutions to your toughest beauty and personal care problems. Experience nature and purity in every formula with the combination of select natural ingredients, premium essential oils, and our naturally-based preservative system. Manufactured in sunny Southern California, PURA D’OR is dedicated to providing sustainable and friendly products that use renewable energy. Scalp Therapy Shampoo Less Itching, Healthier Hair Fight itching and other common scalp issues using PURA D’OR Scalp Therapy Shampoo. Because beautiful hair starts with a healthy scalp, we use a blend of cleansing ingredients may help reduce the appearance of flakes, and other visible signs of itching. Our Scalp Therapy Shampoo assists in minimizing dryness and enhancing your hair’s softness and healthy appearance.

Our Approach Rare, Exotic Ingredients We use hand-selected rare botanical ingredients that are imported from different parts of the world to give you the highest quality. Purity in a Bottle With compliance and respect for our mission, we give you purity in every PURA D'OR bottle. All of our products are free from sulfates, parabens, silicones, and other artificial additives. Cruelty-Free Our products are not just harsh-free and Vegan-friendly, but it is also cruelty-free. Our products are not tested on animals. No third-party testings. In-House Manufacturing Our products are manufactured in our U.S. facility with adherence to our strict quality control system to meet and exceed industry and government standards.

How can Scalp Therapy Shampoo improve your hair? While regular shampoos use chemicals and ingredients that can damage your hair in the long run, PURA D'OR Scalp Therapy Shampoo uses a blend of harsh-free ingredients including Argan, Tea Tree, Cedarwood, and Patchouli to nourish and improve your hair's shine, manageability, and restore your tresses

Tea Tree Oil Tea Tree Oil helps clear the follicles from excess oil and buildup that’s causing the itching and dryness. Argan Oil Rejuvenate your hair and restore its life & shine with Argan Oil. It also adds protection to the hair shafts against environmental damage. Lavender Oil Helps promote healthy scalp and follicles by reducing minor irritations, itchiness, and promoting hair growth. Peppermint Oil Peppermint has a cooling effect that help relief scalp and soothe itchy, dry scalp for a healthy and shinier hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shampoo and conditioner
reviews.reviewText: I was not sure if this would be up to the reviews. I really like the duo. I have allergies to so many things. Hair products being one of them. I was finally going to go back to Free and Clear, which is a good product, it just leaves my hair limp and dull. I read the review on Pura D'Or and decided to try it. I love it! It has cured the itchy scalp (so far), it doesn't cause my body to itch or break out, and it leaves my hair really clean feeling. I like the argan conditioner, it has no scent, and my hair looks nice and conditioned, not dull and limp. The shampoo kind of smells a little strong..but it is not really noticeable after my hair dries, it just smells clean. Good product..good results..very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a GREAT shampoo for people with dry hair, dandruff, or itchy scalps!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my daughter, who was experiencing a dry scalp and dandruff with the cold weather. She said she wasn't having any more irritation in just a few shampoos, and her dandruff was completely gone! I did not expect this shampoo to work this well, but I am pleasantly surprised that I was wrong! It made her hair super soft and healthy as well. The scent is strong due to the peppermint, but the ingredients did what they were supposed to, so I can't complain. You can't even distinguish the smell after using conditioner anyway. It was well worth the money overall!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Leaves hair feeling clean and soft!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this about a week, and I feel it leaves my hair clean and soft, less dry without being oily, and looks smooth and shiny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Results after one wash!
reviews.reviewText: Okay, I never leave reviews, but I just have to for this. I hoped for results quickly but I didn’t expect to be cured after one wash! About a month or two ago I started to notice this weird smell coming from my scalp along with itchiness and white flakes, which at first I thought it was dandruff, but my scalp felt really dry and even spots on my forehead were dry as well. I also noticed how oily my hair was getting after just washing it, and how often it was getting knots, which wasn’t normal for me. I tried “home remedies” like lemon juice and Aloe Vera but they didn’t seem it do anything (the Aloe Vera did get rid of the dry spots on forehead though). I even tried a new pillow case. So I suck it up and started searching for a new shampoo and conditioner, I was previously using Pantene, (I know it’s not a surprise why I was having problems). Btw I have wavy, fine hair. Anyways that’s when I found this one! And it worked wonderfully after one wash I have none of my previous “symptoms”. It also came like 4 days early lol thanks. The only thing to know is that it has a pretty strong smell, I personally like the smell it just smells like essential oils, but it does stay on your hair a little. Also it doesn’t make your hair very soft, which is fine, but Id recommend using a mask a couple time a week or month for softness. I also felt like it really cleaned my hair too! Anyways great product and I love the ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don’t normally write reviews, but I felt the need to write review about this product, because I am amazed. I’ve been struggling with dandruff/dry scalp for months, it flares up occasionally. I never used to have this issue for 38 years or my life until recently. It’s super weird, but I’ve been trying different things to fix it. I’ve used salon shampoo, I’ve used medicated, over-the-counter shampoos. I saw this recommended from a YouTuber. I decided to try it because I am pretty desperate at this point. I used it one time and it immediately started working. I’ve only used it twice, and the dandruff is totally gone, my scalp is no longer itchy, it is insane. My mind is blown, and I am so excited that something finally works, because nothing has worked for me at this point. So thankful , highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Leaves my hair oily after two days.
reviews.reviewText: Shampoo, lather, well and conditioner left my hair soft. Smells lovely. Only problem was that I had to wash my hair every day for it not to look greasy. Used to be able to wash my hair every third day but now I have to wash every day. This is not my favorite shampoo and conditioner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed with the first wash
reviews.reviewText: I am so impressed with this stuff. It smells wonderful. So clean and fresh. It really made my hair feel amazing. I was using prose, everything seems to dry my scalp out lately. It's been unbearably itchy so I am definitely hoping to find relief from that.After the first wash, I feel a difference already and I am looking forward to experience even more benefits going forward.My hair feels so soft and tangle free now that it's dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product is THE TRUTH!
reviews.reviewText: I never leave reviews, but I feel I really need to with this set. Background, I have tried SO many different shampoo and conditioners... and nothing ever made my scalp feel at peace. My scalp would always feel itchy, burn, I'd itch so much that I'd get little sores. My scalp would flake, a lot. Constantly making it seem like I have endless dandruff. So embarrassing. Plus my hair would just feel so lifeless and dry, frizzy. I've tried anywhere from very expensive brands to cheaper, nothing helped. It always went back to flakes, dryness and sores. I finally found this set and I could just cry from joy from the results! Literally, after the first use I didn't see anymore flakes!! My hair has never felt softer, more luscious. I'm also experiencing less breakage and fallout. I have thin hair, so that is very important I don't lose more than I have to. I have a little scalp brush that I massage into my hair after I put on the shampoo and conditioner separately. That seems to have helped with the flake problem, too. So thankful for finding this brand! I will buy it for life, now! If you experience any of the problems I've listed above, please please please consider buying this and giving your hair some love!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: i have had an itchy scalp issue for years. It is cured using this shampoo also less dandruff. Yehudi
reviews.reviewText: I love this productit is amazing and has stopped my head itch and dandruff.
このシャンプーを使い始めてから数日で頭皮の痒みが劇的に改善しました。 確かにシャンプーの匂いはいまいちですがどうせ洗ってる時だけなので気になりません。

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 19, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: Good shampoo, no nasty chemicals, leaves hair and scalp both clean and dandruff free
reviews.reviewText: I've tried traditional mass-market dandruff shampoos such as Head and Shoulders with limited success as the dandruff is usually noticeable again within 24hrs or less. Of course I could wash my hair again but I find frequent washing dries my hair out very quickly (especially if it contains chemicals such as sulphates) so this isn't really an option.I spotted this product being recommended on an 'SLS free' cosmetics website and decided to give it a go. I have to say that it worked from the first application and I've noticed that I can easily go three or four days without seeing any flakes whatsoever, an added bonus is that my scalp doesn't itch like it used to either.Its not the cheapest shampoo on Amazon but it is a good sized bottle and the fact that it leaves my hair soft, manageable and flake free for days at a time more than justifies the cost. If run of the mill dandruff shampoos don't work for you, consider trying this product - well recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 26, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I have a gluten skin contact allergy so Pura'Dor products are perfect for me. I love this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 1, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo fixed all the problems I was having with a dry, flaky scalp. It doesn't lather and has a strong smell but I got used to that after a couple of washes. The bottle lasted for ages as well.One star taken off for the fact that the price has doubled since I bought it. When I originally bought it it was around £15, but is now closer to £30. I've been going through other shampoos trying to find one that works as well as this for a cheaper price and I've had no luck so far... but I also can't afford to drop £30 every time I need a new bottle of shampoo. Maybe if I become desperate enough I'll come back to this as I know for sure that it will work perfectly... but until then I'll sadly have to look elsewhere.This is an excellent shampoo and if you can afford it then I definitely recommend it.
